sentence.Network_en: She indolently displayed in the sunshine.
sentence.Network_cn: 她懒懒地在阳光里伸展着腰肢.

sentence.Network_en: He lives indolently with his relatives.
sentence.Network_cn: 他游手好闲地寄宿在他亲戚那里.

sentence.Network_en: He draws out two bundles of jack straws from the pile and lies there indolently.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从稻草垛上抽了两捆稻草铺在地上,慵懒地躺了下来.
